addNewCourse(uint256,string,address[]).details: Adds a new course to an Agorum

createNewAgorum(string,address[]).details: Creates a new agorum with given name and array of creators. Adds new Agorum to the mapping tracker.Since an Agorum must be composed of at least one course, a course is also created and pushed to Agorum's courses.

getAgorumMetadata(uint256).details: Retrieves the metadata of an Agorum, ie, name, creators, and coursesDoes not return Crowdfund or Payroll information

returns._0: the Agorum name, creators, and courses
